title: Not able to upgrade a skin shard to a skin permanent
body:
I'm not able to upgrade a skin shard to a skin permanent even though I have both the champion and the necessary orange essence. The option of upgrading just appears in red and I can not even click it. I don't know why this is happening and I have heard that is happening to more people. 
Can someone fix this problem?

replies.body: Hey I'd like to take a look!  What skin shard is this for specifically, and how many orange essence are you seeing in your balance as well as to the upgrade cost?

I checked again today and it works now (The skin was; Cottontail Fizz (675 orange essences), and I had 939 orange essences.
Thanks for the help ;D
